import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, NavbarToggler, Collapse, Nav, NavItem, Button, Jumbotron } from 'reactstrap'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; class Header extends Component { constructor (props) { super(props); this.state = { isNavOpen: false }; this.toggleNav = this.toggleNav.bind(this); } toggleNav () { this.setState ({ isNavOpen: !this.state.isNavOpen }) } render() { return ( <>
